review_title: Nice little Cosy place, with customer friendly staff and sumptuous cuisines
review_text:
The Owner goes out of his way to attend each client individually. Consistent taste & sufficient portions. Their Home delivery service is an added advantage. Prices are affordable and menu is exhaustive.

 Good place for hosting small gatherings.
